_comment: Created by EFisher on 12/10/2015 14:31:39 using v2.7
title: How did NHS staff sickness rates vary by trust type?
analysis_commentary: Sickness absence rates by type of organisation demonstrate the same marked seasonal fluctuation as the rate at a national level and no organisation type shows a marked difference over the time period. Absence rates in ambulance trust have been consistently higher than all other types of organisations and mental health and learning disability trusts and community provider trusts also are consistently higher than the national average.
data_source: Health and Social Care Information Centre, NHS Sickness Absence Rates
